root.name: The Splatters
root.description: OverviewIn The Splatters, an award winning action-puzzler, you are tasked with unlocking and mastering a variety of stunts and spectacular moves to clear out stages in the most show-stopping way possible. Its splattery liquid physics engine delivers fast-paced game-play that means you will never play the same way twice.Splatter TV, is an in-game clip sharing feature, that allows you to pick up new moves and strategies by watching the world's top players perform.
